title: Ankali means friend
brief_description: Ankali is part of Sydney’s Albion Street AIDS Centre. It is run by professional staff and 145 volunteer counsellors. The Ankali project has, since 1985, offered emotional support to people with AIDS. This film focuses on two volunteer counsellors, a psychologist and a teacher, and their clients.
